original_text: I have warned Eli that I would punish his family for all time. He knew that his sons were doing very bad things. They were insulting me, God, and Eli did not stop them.
korean_text: 내가 그의 집을 영원토록 심판하겠다고 그에게 말한 것은 그가 아는 죄악 때문이니 이는 그가 자기의 아들들이 저주를 자청하되 금하지 아니하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: that I would punish his family
that his sons were doing very bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들들이 아주 나쁜 일들을 하고 있다는 것을
